name: galo-thing
description: A command line app that uses the Open-Meteo API to tell you whether or not you need to wear your galoshes tomorrow.

scripts.test: node cli.js -n 35.92 -w 79.05 -z America/New_York; node cli.js -n 35.92 -w 79.05 -z America/New_York -j; galosh.js -n 35 -w 79; galosh.js -n 35 -w 79 -d 0

author: @zuntue
